title: Mel B
summary: Melanie Janine Brown (born 29 May 1975;[1] known as Melanie B and Mel B) is an English singer, actress, and television personality. She rose to fame in the 1990s as a member of the girl group Spice Girls, in which she was nicknamed Scary Spice. With over 100 million records sold worldwide,[2] the group became the best-selling female group of all time.
